pull.title: [WIP] Wallet: Cache CWalletDB pointer in CWallet to improve performance

issue.title: Increase DEFAULT_KEYPOOL_SIZE to 10000.
issue.body: Reduce risk of backups being incomplete.

events.body: Can you fix the tests for this?
@TheBlueMatt I'm not sure whether it's broken or if the tests are broken.
Indeed all the tests pass except for the tests which fail on master #8045
@pstratem The `backupwallet` rpc appears to be no longer working

comments.body: The conditional is unneeded: deleting NULL is defined to be a nop.
